description: Source code for the HomeScreen widget in a Flutter app. It constructs the main home page with app bar, hero carousel, genre grid, and new arrivals carousel, including animations and navigation logic.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the app's home screen, comprising app bar, carousels, genres, and arrivals sections.

classes.name: _HeroBannerData
classes.description: Data class representing each banner in the hero carousel.

classes.name: _AnimatedGenreTile
classes.description: Animated widget for each genre tile with staggered animation effects.

classes.name: _GenreTile
classes.description: Stateful widget representing a selectable genre tile.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes animations, timers, and controllers, and starts the hero carousel auto-scroll.

methods.name: _startHeroAutoScroll
methods.description: Sets up a periodic timer to automatically advance the hero carousel.

methods.name: _openListing
methods.description: Navigates to the listing page with optional category.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for a given book.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the main Scaffold with app bar and body comprising various sections with animations.

methods.name: _heroCarousel
methods.description: Builds the hero banner carousel with indicators.

methods.name: _buildHeroSlide
methods.description: Creates individual hero slide with gradient background and content.

methods.name: _genresGrid
methods.description: Builds the grid of genre tiles with animation.

methods.name: _circleIcon
methods.description: Creates a circular icon button for actions like wishlist and orders.
